title: Watch: Poga훾ar Destroys Oude Kwaremont in Final Flanders Recon Ride
content:
Video: Paced into the climb at 60kph by UAE teammates, Poga훾ar exploded up Oude Kwaremont like it was race day: 'I need to try to open a gap.'

Read the full article at Watch: Poga훾ar Destroys Oude Kwaremont in Final Flanders Recon Ride on Velo.
author: ahood
